comments.content:
For what its worth:   
   
 [http://www.copyrightaid.co.uk/berne\_convention\_signatories.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018213842/http:/www.copyrightaid.co.uk/berne_convention_signatories.htm)   
   
I cannot vouch for accuracy. Your local public or academic library should have a copy and a signatory list.   
   
WIPO should have it but it was taking forever to sort through their stuff...   
   
Jon
